  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the state of the object by running all registered updaters.

      This method iterates over the list of updaters and calls the `run()` method on each one. This allows for the object to be updated based on the current state of the program.

      Specified by:
      update in interface PoseProvider
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the updaters are null
